data.name: 100% No Up+A
data.rules:
Timing begins with control of Link on the Overworld.  Timing ends with loss of control upon standing next to Zelda.
Up&A on Controller 2 is not allowed. Game overs should be avoided, and may invalidate the run.  
All runs must begin from system reset or power cycle.  Beginning from RETRY, SAVE, or CONTINUE is not permitted.

Items required: Bow, both Bomb upgrades, Magic Boomerang, Raft, Ladder, Recorder, Wand, Red Candle, Bible/Magic Book, Magic Key, Red Ring, Silver Arrows, Power Bracelet, Letter, all Heart Containers, all Triforce pieces.

Please use the Forum or contact moderators if you have questions.
